alert.note: Alert for Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 7:08PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Smithland Dam. .Rain that has fallen the past week, combined with expected additional rainfall this week, will continue to cause rises on the Ohio River. At Smithland, the river is expected to go above flood stage Thursday. For the Ohio River...including Smithland Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Smithland Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 35.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 42.5 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
